title: Creamy BLT Dip recipe
directions: Using a mixer, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and sour cream. Add in 1/3 cup crumbled bacon, shredded mozzarella, and shredded parmesan.
Spread in the bottom of a 2 quart baking dish (or an 8x8 pan).
Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until lightly browned and bubbly on the edges.
Remove from the oven and top with remaining crumbled bacon, diced tomatoes, and lettuce.
Serve warm with crackers or bread.

To prep this dish ahead of time, you’ll prepare the cream cheese base as directed, cover and refrigerate for up to 3 days. Wash lettuce in cold water, wrap in a little bit of paper towel and store in a food bag in the fridge (don’t shred it until just before serving though). If making homemade, the crostini can be prepared a few days in advance and stored in an airtight container.
ingredients: 8 oz package of cream cheese 2, room temp
crackers for serving this is great with club crackers, bread, or even pita chips!
